title: [Gameplay] Snow Day Singed Back sounds

embed.description: Backing as Snow Day Singed produces the wrong back sound.

body:
Every time one backs while using the Snow Day Singed skin the backing sound repeat and make everything sound wrong.

Start a custom or normal game, pick singed, pick Snow Day skin, back anywhere any time.

Occurs every time on any back.

Video example provided.

replies.body: Wanted to post this, and just found this one, yeah this is pretty annoying to say the least{{item:3070}} , but definitely not game breaking

HEy Deadfoot320! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a listen and see what's going on here!
